text: @SpeakerPelosi “I just landed at JFK after reporting on #coronavirus in Milan & Lombardy —the epicenter of Italy’s  outbreak— for @vicenews. I walked right through US customs. They didn’t ask me where in Italy I went or if I came into contact w/sick people. They didn’t ask me anything.” Lindau
